headline.main: China to Relax Rules to Boost Big Insurers' Expansion-Sources
headline.print_headline: China to Relax Rules to Boost Big Insurers' Expansion-Sources

lead_paragraph: China's insurance regulator is considering an industry shake-up that could see the biggest and most solvent firms resuming an overseas expansion, while smaller, riskier insurers would come under tighter scrutiny.
snippet: China's insurance regulator is considering an industry shake-up that could see the biggest and most solvent firms resuming an overseas expansion, while smaller, riskier insurers would come under tighter scrutiny....
